content: LankaTel Customer Support is available 24/7 through multiple channels to assist customers with inquiries, technical issues, billing questions, and service requests. Our support team consists of over 1,200 trained professionals across three call centers in Colombo, Kandy, and Jaffna. We pride ourselves on delivering trilingual support in Sinhala, Tamil, and English with an average response time of under 45 seconds.

LankaTel Customer Support Hotlines: General Inquiries & Support - 1234 (from LankaTel mobile, free) or +94 11 234 1234 (from other networks), Technical Support - 1235 (24/7), Billing Inquiries - 1236 (6 AM - 10 PM), Enterprise Support - 1237 (24/7), Roaming Support - +94 77 123 4567 (24/7 international), Emergency Network Issues - 1299 (24/7), New Connections - 1238 (8 AM - 8 PM). All calls to 1234 are free from LankaTel mobile numbers.

LankaTel Digital Support Channels: Website Live Chat - www.lankatel.lk/chat (24/7), WhatsApp Business - +94 77 123 4568 (24/7), Facebook Messenger - @LankaTelSL (6 AM - 12 AM), Twitter/X - @LankaTelSupport (6 AM - 12 AM), Instagram DM - @lankatel_official (6 AM - 10 PM), Email - support@lankatel.lk (response within 4 hours), Self-Service Portal - my.lankatel.lk (24/7). Our AI chatbot 'Nila' handles common queries instantly, with human agents available for complex issues.

The LankaTel Self-Service App (MyLankaTel) allows customers to: Check balance and usage, Recharge prepaid accounts, Pay bills online, View and download bills, Change packages and add-ons, Report network issues, Track support tickets, Locate nearest service centers, Access exclusive app-only offers. Download from Google Play Store or Apple App Store. App requires LankaTel account registration.

LankaTel USSD Self-Service Codes: *123# - Main Menu, *123*1# - Check Balance, *123*2# - Check Data Balance, *123*3# - Activate Data Package, *123*4# - Check Voice Minutes, *123*5# - Activate Voice Package, *123*6# - Transfer Balance, *123*7# - Request Call Back, *123*8# - Share Data, *123*9# - Emergency Credit, *121# - Recharge Menu, *122# - Package Activation Menu, *124# - Value Added Services, *125# - Account Information.

LankaTel Support Escalation Levels: LEVEL 1 - First Contact Resolution: General inquiries, balance checks, simple troubleshooting (Target: 80% resolution). LEVEL 2 - Technical Support: Complex technical issues, billing disputes, service complaints (Target: 24-hour resolution). LEVEL 3 - Advanced Technical: Network issues, infrastructure problems, enterprise support (Target: 48-hour resolution). LEVEL 4 - Management Escalation: Unresolved complaints, VIP customers, legal matters (Target: 72-hour resolution). Customers can request escalation at any time by stating 'I want to speak to a supervisor'.

LankaTel Complaint Handling: Step 1 - Submit complaint via any channel (hotline, app, service center, email). Step 2 - Receive complaint reference number (CRN) starting with 'LT-'. Step 3 - Initial response within 2 hours. Step 4 - Investigation and resolution within 24-72 hours depending on complexity. Step 5 - Follow-up call to confirm resolution. Step 6 - If unsatisfied, escalate to Customer Relations Manager. Step 7 - Final escalation to Telecommunications Regulatory Commission (TRC) if unresolved. All complaints are logged and tracked through our CRM system.

LankaTel Customer Service SLAs: Phone Call Answer Time - Average 45 seconds (Target: <60 seconds), Chat Response Time - Average 30 seconds (Target: <45 seconds), Email Response Time - Average 2 hours (Target: <4 hours), Complaint Resolution - 90% within 24 hours, Technician Visit - Within 24 hours for urban, 48 hours for rural areas, New Connection Activation - Within 4 hours for mobile, 3 days for FTTH, Bill Correction - Within 24 hours, Refund Processing - Within 5 business days.

LankaTel Field Technician Services: Available for FTTH installations, router troubleshooting, signal issues, and equipment replacement. Booking Methods: Call 1235, MyLankaTel app, or visit service center. Service Hours: 8 AM - 6 PM daily (emergency available 24/7). Standard visit is FREE for equipment issues under warranty. Charges: Router configuration - LKR 500, Inside wiring repair - LKR 1,000, New point installation - LKR 1,500, Emergency after-hours visit - LKR 2,500. Technician arrives within the scheduled 2-hour window with SMS confirmation.

LankaTel values customer feedback through: Post-call surveys (press 1 to rate), SMS surveys after service interactions, Email surveys for new connections, App rating prompts, Website feedback form at www.lankatel.lk/feedback, Annual customer satisfaction survey, Social media monitoring, Mystery customer program. Feedback directly influences our service improvements. Customers providing feedback are entered into monthly lucky draws for LKR 10,000 prizes.

LankaTel VIP (Vishishta) Program for high-value customers: Dedicated VIP hotline - 1230 (no wait time), Personal Account Manager assigned, Priority field service (same-day visits), Exclusive lounge access at flagship stores, Airport lounge access (BIA), Complimentary device protection, Free annual device health check, Invitation to exclusive events, Birthday and anniversary recognition. VIP status is awarded to customers with monthly spend above LKR 5,000 or tenure above 5 years.

LankaTel Enterprise Support for business customers: Dedicated Enterprise Hotline - 1237 (24/7), Assigned Technical Account Manager, 4-hour SLA for critical issues, Proactive network monitoring, Monthly service reviews, Quarterly business reviews, Custom reporting dashboard, Priority access to new products, On-site support available, Emergency backup connectivity. Enterprise support tiers: Bronze (5+ lines), Silver (20+ lines), Gold (50+ lines), Platinum (100+ lines).

LankaTel Accessibility Services: Hearing Impaired - Video relay service via app, SMS support at 0771234567, Text-based chat support, Written transcripts available. Visually Impaired - Screen reader compatible app, Voice-guided USSD menus, Audio billing statements, Large print bills on request. Mobility Impaired - Home visits for device setup, Door-to-door SIM delivery, Wheelchair accessible service centers. Senior Citizens - Dedicated queue at service centers, Patient and clear communication, Simplified menu options. Contact accessibility@lankatel.lk for special arrangements.

LankaTel provides support in all three national languages: Sinhala (සිංහල) - All channels 24/7, Tamil (தமிழ்) - All channels 24/7, specialized Jaffna call center, English - All channels 24/7. Press 1 for Sinhala, Press 2 for Tamil, Press 3 for English when calling hotline. App and website available in all three languages. All documents and bills can be requested in preferred language. Sign language support available at flagship stores by appointment.

LankaTel Emergency Support: During natural disasters (floods, cyclones), LankaTel activates emergency protocols: Free emergency calls to 110, 119, 1990, Temporary free data for affected areas, Mobile charging stations in evacuation centers, Priority network restoration, SMS updates on service status, Waived late payment fees for affected customers. Emergency contact during disasters: 1299 or +94 77 199 9999. LankaTel partners with Disaster Management Center and Sri Lanka Red Cross for coordinated response.

LankaTel Support Operating Hours: Phone Support (1234) - 24/7, Technical Support (1235) - 24/7, Billing Inquiries (1236) - 6:00 AM to 10:00 PM, New Connections (1238) - 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM, Enterprise Support (1237) - 24/7, Live Chat - 24/7, WhatsApp - 24/7, Social Media - 6:00 AM to 12:00 AM, Email - 24/7 (response within 4 hours), Service Centers - Weekdays 8:30 AM to 5:30 PM, Saturday 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM, Retail Outlets - 10:00 AM to 9:00 PM daily.

LankaTel uses an advanced ticket management system: Each interaction generates a unique ticket ID (format: LT-YYYYMMDD-XXXXXX). Track ticket status via: MyLankaTel app, my.lankatel.lk, SMS 'STATUS [Ticket ID]' to 1234, Call 1234 with ticket ID. Ticket statuses: OPEN (received), IN PROGRESS (being handled), PENDING (awaiting customer response), RESOLVED (solution provided), CLOSED (confirmed complete). Tickets auto-escalate if not resolved within SLA timeframes.

LankaTel International Roaming Support: Before travel - Activate roaming via *123*99# or app, check destination rates, purchase roaming bundles. While abroad - Contact +94 77 123 4567 (24/7, reverse charges accepted), use Wi-Fi calling through app. Roaming packages available for 100+ countries. Emergency support for lost/stolen phones abroad - immediate SIM block and replacement at destination (partner network dependent). Roaming data alerts sent at 50%, 80%, and 100% usage. Fair usage policy applies.

LankaTel Callback Service: Request callback instead of waiting on hold. Methods: Press 1 during call queue, SMS 'CALLBACK' to 1234, App > Support > Request Callback, Website callback form. Benefits: No call charges, callback within committed timeframe, schedule for convenient time, receive SMS with callback window. Callback available: 24/7 for general support, Business hours for billing, Within 30 minutes during peak hours, Within 2 hours during off-peak. VIP customers get priority callback placement. Callback service reduces wait times and improves customer experience.

LankaTel Live Chat Support: Available 24/7 on website and app. Features: Instant connection with agents, File sharing for screenshots, Chat history saved, Transcript email option, Escalation to voice call if needed, Average response time 30 seconds, Multi-language support (Sinhala, Tamil, English), AI chatbot 'Nila' for common queries, Human agent for complex issues. Chat best for: Quick questions, account inquiries, package information, simple troubleshooting. Complex technical issues may require phone support. Chat sessions typically last 5-10 minutes for resolution.

LankaTel WhatsApp Business Support: Number +94 77 123 4568, Available 24/7, Verified business account (green tick), Send message to start conversation, Support in Sinhala, Tamil, English, Share screenshots and photos, Voice messages supported, File sharing available, Quick responses (average 2 minutes), Can handle: Balance checks, package activation, bill inquiries, simple troubleshooting, account updates. Not suitable for: Complex technical issues (redirected to phone), Emergency network problems. WhatsApp convenient for customers who prefer messaging over calling.

LankaTel Social Media Support Channels: Facebook Messenger - @LankaTelSL (6 AM-12 AM), Twitter/X - @LankaTelSupport (6 AM-12 AM), Instagram DM - @lankatel_official (6 AM-10 PM), Public response guaranteed within 1 hour during business hours, Private messaging for account-specific issues, Public posts for general inquiries, Social media team monitors all mentions, Escalation to phone support for complex issues. Best for: General information, service updates, promotional queries, public complaints. For account-specific issues, use private message or call hotline for security.

LankaTel Email Support: General inquiries - support@lankatel.lk, Billing - billing@lankatel.lk, Technical - technical@lankatel.lk, Enterprise - enterprise@lankatel.lk, Complaints - complaints@lankatel.lk, Response time: Average 2 hours, Target under 4 hours, 24/7 email monitoring, Include account number and details, Attach screenshots if relevant, Email responses include ticket reference, Can escalate via email, Email history maintained. Best for: Non-urgent inquiries, detailed explanations, documentation requests, formal complaints. For urgent issues, call hotline for immediate assistance.

LankaTel Service Centers: Over 50 locations nationwide, Major centers: Colombo Fort (flagship), Kandy City Center, Galle Main Street, Negombo, Jaffna, Kurunegala, Matara, Anuradhapura, Ratnapura. Services available: New connections, Bill payment, SIM replacement, Plan changes, Account modifications, Technical support, Device sales, Complaints. Hours: Monday-Friday 8:30 AM-5:30 PM, Saturday 9:00 AM-2:00 PM, Closed Sundays and public holidays. VIP lounges at major centers, Appointment booking via app, Queue management system, Estimated wait times displayed. Find nearest center via app or call 1234.

LankaTel Appointment Booking: Book service center appointments via MyLankaTel app to avoid wait times. Process: App > Service Centers > Book Appointment, Select service type, Choose date and time slot, Receive SMS confirmation, Arrive 5 minutes before appointment. Benefits: No waiting, Guaranteed service time, Preferred time slots, SMS reminders, Can reschedule or cancel. Available for: New connections, Account modifications, Technical consultations, Device purchases, Complex inquiries. Walk-ins also accepted but may have wait time. Appointment slots: 15-minute intervals, Available up to 7 days in advance.

LankaTel Technical Support Tiers: Level 1 - Basic troubleshooting (password reset, package activation, simple device setup), Level 2 - Network issues (connectivity problems, speed issues, coverage complaints), Level 3 - Advanced technical (router configuration, complex network problems, infrastructure issues), Level 4 - Engineering (critical network problems, new technology deployment). Escalation: Level 1 resolves 80% of issues, Complex issues escalate automatically, VIP and enterprise get direct Level 2 access, Critical issues escalate to Level 4 within 2 hours. Average resolution: Level 1 - 10 minutes, Level 2 - 30 minutes, Level 3 - 2 hours, Level 4 - 24 hours.

LankaTel Remote Technical Support: Available for router and device configuration issues. Process: Call 1235, Agent guides through steps, Screen sharing available (with permission), Remote configuration for routers, Troubleshooting assistance, No charge for remote support. Suitable for: Router setup, WiFi password reset, Device configuration, APN settings, App installation guidance. Not suitable for: Hardware issues (requires technician visit), Network outages, Physical equipment problems. Remote support saves time and avoids technician visit charges. Available 24/7 for technical support hotline customers.

LankaTel Knowledge Base: Comprehensive self-help resources available. Access: Website www.lankatel.lk/help, MyLankaTel app > Help & Support, Searchable FAQ database, Step-by-step guides, Video tutorials, Troubleshooting articles, Service guides. Topics covered: Account management, Billing and payments, Technical support, Package information, Device setup, Network issues, Common problems. Updated regularly with new solutions, Available in Sinhala, Tamil, English, Mobile-optimized, Can reduce need for support calls. Search by keywords or browse categories. Most customers find answers in knowledge base before calling.

LankaTel Video Call Support: Available for complex technical issues and visual troubleshooting. Access: Request via live chat, App > Support > Video Call, Available for: Router configuration, Device setup assistance, Visual problem diagnosis, Complex troubleshooting. Benefits: See problem in real-time, Visual guidance, Faster resolution, Screen sharing option, Record session (with permission). Requirements: Stable internet connection, Camera and microphone access, App installed. Available: Business hours for standard support, 24/7 for enterprise customers, VIP customers get priority access. Video calls typically last 15-30 minutes for complex issues.

LankaTel Support Quality Assurance: All support interactions monitored for quality, Random call recordings reviewed, Customer satisfaction surveys after each interaction, Quality metrics tracked: Resolution rate, Customer satisfaction, Average handling time, First contact resolution, Agent performance reviews monthly, Training based on quality feedback, Continuous improvement programs, Mystery customer program, Quality standards: Professional communication, Accurate information, Empathetic service, Complete resolution. Quality scores directly impact agent performance and training. Target: 90%+ customer satisfaction, 80%+ first contact resolution.

LankaTel Support Team Training: Comprehensive initial training program (6 weeks), Ongoing training on new products and services, Technical certification programs, Customer service excellence training, Language proficiency (Sinhala, Tamil, English), Product knowledge updates, Technology training, Soft skills development, Specialized training for technical support, Enterprise support training, Regular assessments and certifications. Support team: 1,200+ trained professionals, Average 3+ years experience, Specialized teams for different services, Continuous learning culture, Expert knowledge in telecommunications, Customer-focused approach. Training ensures high-quality support delivery.

LankaTel Support Response Times: Phone calls - Average 45 seconds (target <60 seconds), Live chat - Average 30 seconds (target <45 seconds), WhatsApp - Average 2 minutes, Email - Average 2 hours (target <4 hours), Social media - Within 1 hour during business hours, Service center walk-in - Token system, average wait 10-15 minutes, Appointment booking - On-time service, Technical callback - Within 4 hours, Emergency support - Immediate response, VIP customers - Priority queue, <30 seconds, Enterprise - Dedicated line, immediate. Response times monitored and improved continuously. Peak hours (6-10 PM) may have slightly longer wait times.

LankaTel Support by Service Type: Mobile Services - General support 1234, Technical 1235, Prepaid recharge, package activation, postpaid billing, Mobile Support - Device setup, network selection, APN configuration, SIM issues, Fixed Broadband - FTTH installation, router support, speed issues, connectivity problems, Enterprise Services - Dedicated support 1237, Account management, technical solutions, Billing Support - 1236 for all billing inquiries, disputes, payments, Roaming Support - International assistance, activation, packages. Each service has specialized support team with expertise in that area. Support channels available for all service types.

LankaTel Peak Hour Support: Peak hours: 6:00 PM-10:00 PM weekdays, Weekends 10:00 AM-2:00 PM. Strategies: Additional agents deployed, Extended callback service, Priority queue for urgent issues, Self-service promotion, App and USSD codes encouraged, Estimated wait times displayed, Hold music with tips, SMS queue position updates. Wait times: Peak hours - 2-5 minutes average, Off-peak - Under 1 minute, VIP customers - Priority queue always, Enterprise - Dedicated line. Best times to call: Early morning (6-9 AM), Late night (10 PM-12 AM), Mid-afternoon (2-4 PM). Self-service options available 24/7 to avoid wait times.

LankaTel Ticket Tracking: Every support interaction generates ticket with unique ID (format: LT-YYYYMMDD-XXXXXX). Track tickets via: MyLankaTel app > Support > My Tickets, Website my.lankatel.lk > Support Tickets, SMS 'STATUS [Ticket ID]' to 1234, Call 1234 with ticket ID. Ticket information: Status (Open, In Progress, Pending, Resolved, Closed), Assigned agent, Last update, Expected resolution time, History of interactions, Attachments if any. Ticket updates: SMS notifications for status changes, Email updates for major changes, App push notifications, Can add comments to tickets, Escalation automatic if SLA exceeded.

LankaTel Prepaid Support: Dedicated support for prepaid customers, Services: Balance inquiries, Recharge assistance, Package activation, Usage monitoring, Validity information, Bonus data queries, Balance transfer, Emergency credit. Support channels: All standard channels available, USSD codes for self-service, App support, Hotline 1234, Service centers. Prepaid-specific: No billing disputes (pay-as-you-go), Focus on recharge and packages, Validity and expiry information, Bonus and promotional offers, Emergency credit for loyal customers. Prepaid customers can access all support services. Support available 24/7 for prepaid inquiries.

LankaTel Postpaid Support: Comprehensive support for postpaid customers, Services: Bill inquiries and explanations, Payment assistance, Credit limit information, Plan changes, Billing disputes, Payment arrangements, Account modifications, Usage analysis. Dedicated billing support: Hotline 1236 (6 AM-10 PM), Email billing@lankatel.lk, Service center billing counters, Online billing support. Postpaid-specific: Bill breakdown explanations, Payment method setup, Auto-pay assistance, Credit limit increases, Payment plans for financial hardship, Billing cycle changes, Statement requests. Postpaid customers get priority support for billing matters. Extended support hours for billing inquiries.

LankaTel Enterprise Support: Dedicated enterprise support team, Services: 24/7 dedicated hotline 1237, Assigned Technical Account Manager, 4-hour SLA for critical issues, Proactive network monitoring, Monthly service reviews, Quarterly business reviews, Custom reporting, Priority access to new products, On-site support available, Emergency backup connectivity. Support tiers: Bronze (5+ lines) - Standard enterprise support, Silver (20+ lines) - Enhanced support, Gold (50+ lines) - Premium support with dedicated manager, Platinum (100+ lines) - Highest tier with 24/7 dedicated support. Enterprise customers get specialized support for business needs.

LankaTel Senior Citizen Support: Specialized support for customers aged 60+, Services: Dedicated senior care line with minimal wait, Patient and clear communication, Simplified menu options, Large print documentation, Audio billing statements, Home visits for device setup, Door-to-door SIM delivery, Priority service at centers, Family member authorization accepted, Simplified processes. Support channels: All standard channels available, Senior-specific assistance, Trained agents for senior support, Family can assist with calls, Written instructions provided. Senior citizens get priority and patient support. Contact accessibility@lankatel.lk for special arrangements.

LankaTel Student Support: Specialized support for student customers, Services: Student package information, Verification assistance, Educational app support, Student discount queries, Campus connectivity support, Device discount information, Family discount programs, Student-specific promotions. Support channels: All standard channels, Student verification support, Campus service centers, Online student portal (coming soon), Dedicated student support team. Student-specific: Age 16-25 verification, Educational institution verification, Student package eligibility, Free educational app data, Device purchase discounts. Students get specialized support for educational needs. Campus verification drives available.

LankaTel Rural Customer Support: Specialized support for rural customers, Services: Coverage information, Rural connectivity solutions, Gama initiative support, Internet kiosk assistance, Agricultural IoT support, Rural package information, Extended technician visits, Community support programs. Support channels: All standard channels, Rural service centers, Mobile service units, Community outreach, Local language support, Trained rural support agents. Rural-specific: Coverage verification, Connectivity solutions, Community programs, Agricultural technology support, Rural package options, Extended support hours at rural centers. Rural customers get specialized support for connectivity needs.

LankaTel Support Documentation: Comprehensive documentation available, Types: User guides, Setup instructions, Troubleshooting guides, FAQ articles, Video tutorials, Service manuals, Policy documents, Terms and conditions, Privacy policies, Billing guides. Access: Website help section, MyLankaTel app, Service centers, Email on request, Available in Sinhala, Tamil, English, Mobile-optimized formats, Downloadable PDFs, Printable versions. Documentation updated regularly, Covers all services and features, Step-by-step instructions, Visual guides included, Video tutorials for complex tasks. Documentation helps customers self-serve and reduces support calls.

LankaTel Support Performance Metrics: Customer satisfaction: 90%+ target, First contact resolution: 80%+ target, Average handling time: Monitored and optimized, Response times: All within SLA targets, Resolution rates: Tracked by issue type, Agent performance: Individual metrics tracked, Quality scores: Regular assessments, Escalation rates: Monitored and reduced, Self-service adoption: Encouraged and tracked, Support cost per interaction: Optimized. Performance reviewed: Daily operational reviews, Weekly team reviews, Monthly management reviews, Quarterly strategic reviews. Continuous improvement based on metrics. Performance targets exceeded consistently.

LankaTel Support Technology: Advanced CRM system for ticket management, AI chatbot 'Nila' for instant responses, Knowledge base system, Multi-channel support platform, Call recording and monitoring, Screen sharing tools, Remote access capabilities, Mobile support apps, Analytics and reporting tools, Quality monitoring systems. Technology benefits: Faster resolution, Better tracking, Improved customer experience, Efficient operations, Data-driven improvements, Seamless channel integration, Real-time monitoring, Automated workflows. Technology continuously upgraded, Latest tools and platforms, Integration with all systems, Secure and compliant, Customer data protection. Technology enables excellent support delivery.

LankaTel International Customer Support: Support for customers traveling or living abroad, Services: Roaming activation and support, International calling assistance, Roaming package information, Emergency support while abroad, SIM replacement at destination (partner dependent), International payment support, Account access from abroad. Support channels: International hotline +94 77 123 4567, Email support, WhatsApp international, Online chat, Reverse charge calls accepted, 24/7 availability. International-specific: Roaming rates by country, Travel tips, Emergency procedures, Partner network information, International payment methods, Account access from anywhere. International customers get full support while abroad.

LankaTel Complaint Resolution Process: Step 1 - Complaint received via any channel, Step 2 - Ticket created with reference number, Step 3 - Initial response within 2 hours, Step 4 - Investigation and resolution (24-72 hours), Step 5 - Follow-up call to confirm resolution, Step 6 - Customer satisfaction check, Step 7 - Escalation if needed. Resolution targets: 90% within 24 hours, 95% within 48 hours, 99% within 72 hours. Escalation path: Supervisor, Customer Relations Manager, Senior Management, TRC. Complaint tracking: Full history maintained, Status updates provided, Resolution documented, Customer feedback collected. Complaint resolution is priority for LankaTel.

LankaTel Self-Service Options: MyLankaTel App - Comprehensive self-service, USSD Codes - Quick actions via phone, Website Portal - Full account management, IVR System - Automated phone menu, Knowledge Base - Self-help resources, Video Tutorials - Visual guides, FAQ Database - Common questions, Automated Services - Balance, usage, package activation. Benefits: 24/7 availability, No wait times, Instant results, Convenient access, Cost-effective, Privacy, Control. Self-service handles: 60%+ of customer interactions, Reduces call volume, Faster for customers, Available anytime. Support agents available when self-service insufficient. Self-service continuously improved and expanded.

LankaTel Device Support: Comprehensive device support services, Services: Device setup assistance, APN configuration, Network settings, Device compatibility, Troubleshooting, Device replacement (if under warranty), Device financing support, Trade-in assistance, Device insurance claims. Support channels: Technical support 1235, Service centers, Remote assistance, Video call support, Device-specific guides. Device support covers: Smartphones, Tablets, Routers, Modems, IoT devices, Wearables. Support includes: Setup guidance, Configuration help, Troubleshooting, Warranty claims, Replacement procedures, Insurance claims. Device support available for all LankaTel customers. Specialized support for device-related issues.

LankaTel Support Feedback System: Multiple feedback channels, Post-call surveys (press 1 to rate), SMS surveys after interactions, Email surveys, App rating prompts, Website feedback form, Annual satisfaction survey, Social media monitoring, Mystery customer program. Feedback used for: Service improvements, Agent training, Process optimization, Technology upgrades, Policy changes, Performance management. Feedback rewards: Monthly lucky draws (LKR 10,000 prizes), Recognition programs, Improvement acknowledgments. Feedback response: All feedback reviewed, Improvements implemented, Customers informed of changes, Continuous improvement culture. Customer feedback drives support excellence. Feedback is valued and acted upon.

LankaTel Network Issue Support: Specialized support for network problems, Services: Coverage complaints, Signal strength issues, Network outages, Speed problems, Connectivity issues, Network selection help, Coverage verification, Network status information. Support process: Report issue via app, call 1235, or service center, Issue logged with ticket, Network team investigation, Resolution or explanation provided, Follow-up confirmation. Network support: 24/7 availability, Priority for critical issues, Field surveys for persistent problems, Network optimization, Coverage expansion planning. Network issues: Most resolved within 4 hours, Critical issues escalated immediately, Customers kept informed, Status updates provided. Network support ensures reliable connectivity.

LankaTel Billing Support: Dedicated billing support team, Services: Bill explanations, Payment assistance, Billing disputes, Payment methods, Auto-pay setup, Billing cycle changes, Statement requests, Tax inquiries, Refund processing. Support channels: Billing hotline 1236 (6 AM-10 PM), Email billing@lankatel.lk, Service center billing counters, Online billing support, Dedicated billing agents. Billing support: Detailed bill breakdowns, Payment method guidance, Dispute resolution, Payment arrangements, Billing corrections, Refund assistance, Tax documentation. Billing inquiries: Average resolution 24 hours, Complex disputes 48-72 hours, Payment assistance immediate, Billing support available extended hours. Billing support ensures accurate and clear billing.

LankaTel New Customer Support: Specialized onboarding support, Services: Account setup assistance, Service activation help, Package selection guidance, Device setup, App installation, First bill explanation, Welcome call, New customer orientation. Support channels: New connections hotline 1238 (8 AM-8 PM), Service centers, Online chat, Email support, Dedicated new customer team. New customer benefits: Welcome package, Setup assistance, Orientation materials, Special offers, Priority support, Follow-up calls. New customer support: Comprehensive guidance, Patient explanations, Multiple contact options, Extended support hours, Welcome experience focus. New customers get extra attention and support. Onboarding support ensures smooth start.

LankaTel Account Security Support: Specialized security support, Services: Password reset assistance, 2FA setup help, Account freeze/unfreeze, Security breach response, Suspicious activity investigation, PIN reset, Account recovery, Security best practices. Support channels: Security hotline (via 1234), Email security@lankatel.lk, Service centers (for PIN reset), Dedicated security team. Security support: Immediate response for breaches, Account protection assistance, Security guidance, Incident investigation, Recovery procedures, Prevention advice. Security issues: Highest priority, Immediate action, 24/7 availability, Escalation to security team, Customer protection focus. Account security support protects customer accounts and data. Security is top priority.

LankaTel Wait Time Management: Strategies to minimize wait times, Queue management system, Estimated wait times displayed, Callback service option, Hold music with tips, SMS queue position updates, Priority queue for VIP/enterprise, Self-service promotion, Additional agents during peak, Extended callback availability. Wait time targets: Average 45 seconds, Maximum 2 minutes, VIP immediate, Enterprise immediate. Wait time reduction: Continuous monitoring, Agent optimization, Technology improvements, Self-service expansion, Peak hour strategies. Customers informed: Estimated wait shown, Queue position updates, Alternative options provided, Callback available. Wait time management ensures quick support access. Continuous improvement in wait times.

LankaTel Package Selection Support: Assistance choosing right package, Services: Usage analysis, Package recommendations, Plan comparisons, Cost calculations, Feature explanations, Package customization, Upgrade/downgrade guidance, Family plan advice. Support channels: Sales hotline 1238, Service centers, Online chat, Email, Dedicated sales team. Package support: Understand customer needs, Analyze usage patterns, Recommend suitable packages, Explain features and benefits, Compare options, Calculate costs, Assist with activation. Package selection: Free consultation, No pressure sales, Customer-focused advice, Multiple options explained, Best fit recommendation. Package selection support helps customers choose right plan. Customer satisfaction focus.

LankaTel Service Modification Support: Assistance with service changes, Services: Plan changes, Package modifications, Add-on services, Feature additions, Service upgrades, Service downgrades, Account modifications, Profile updates. Support channels: General support 1234, Service centers, Online chat, App support, Dedicated modification team. Modification support: Explain options, Process changes, Confirm modifications, Update accounts, Provide confirmations, Explain impacts, Handle fees if any. Service modifications: Most changes immediate, Some require processing time, Confirmations provided, Changes documented, Customer informed. Service modification support ensures smooth changes. Modifications handled efficiently.

LankaTel Payment Issue Support: Assistance with payment problems, Services: Payment method setup, Failed payment resolution, Payment retry assistance, Payment method updates, Auto-pay troubleshooting, Payment confirmation, Refund inquiries, Payment history. Support channels: Billing support 1236, Service centers, Online support, Email billing@lankatel.lk, Payment specialists. Payment support: Troubleshoot failures, Update payment methods, Retry payments, Setup auto-pay, Confirm payments, Process refunds, Explain charges. Payment issues: Most resolved immediately, Payment retry assistance, Alternative methods suggested, Confirmation provided, History available. Payment issue support ensures successful payments. Payment problems resolved quickly.

LankaTel Support Continuous Improvement: Ongoing enhancement of support services, Improvement areas: Response times, Resolution rates, Customer satisfaction, Technology upgrades, Process optimization, Agent training, Self-service expansion, Channel integration. Improvement methods: Customer feedback analysis, Performance metrics review, Best practice adoption, Technology innovation, Process refinement, Training enhancement, Quality monitoring, Regular assessments. Improvement results: Better response times, Higher resolution rates, Increased satisfaction, More efficient operations, Enhanced capabilities, Better customer experience. Continuous improvement: Regular reviews, Implementation of changes, Measurement of results, Further improvements. Support continuously improved for excellence. Customer-focused improvements always.

LankaTel Account Recovery Support: Assistance recovering locked or inaccessible accounts, Services: Password recovery, Account unlock, Security verification, Account reactivation, Identity verification, Account restoration. Support process: Verify identity with security questions, Provide account details, Complete verification process, Restore account access, Reset security settings if needed. Recovery support: Available 24/7, Multiple verification methods, Secure process, Quick restoration, Account protection focus. Recovery time: Immediate for simple cases, 24-48 hours for complex cases, Security verification required, Account protection maintained. Account recovery support ensures secure account restoration. Customer data protected during recovery.

LankaTel Service Activation Support: Assistance activating new services, Services: New connection activation, Service feature activation, Package activation, Add-on activation, Roaming activation, VAS activation. Support channels: New connections hotline 1238, General support 1234, Service centers, Online activation, App activation. Activation support: Step-by-step guidance, Confirmation provided, Activation verification, Troubleshooting if issues, Follow-up confirmation. Activation time: Mobile connections - 30 minutes, FTTH - 3-7 days, Packages - Immediate, Add-ons - Immediate, Roaming - 2-4 hours. Service activation support ensures smooth service start.
